nodes.text: Star Wars: Millennium Falcon: A 3-D Owner's Guide

Star Wars: Millennium Falcon: A 3-D Owner's Guide is a twenty-two-page, three-dimensional "board book" presenting an in-depth look at the inner workings of a YT-1300 light freighter, specifically, the Millennium Falcon. The book acts partly as an in-universe owner's manual to the Millennium Falcon. As the reader progresses through the book, which is designed around a cardboard cutout model of the Millennium Falcon, each page offers a different 3-D view of the starship's interior and exterior superstructure, as well as several notes written by the ship's previous owners, including Han Solo. The book was published by Scholastic in September 2010.
A revised and updated edition was released in November 2018.
Take the fastest ship in the galaxy for a spin!
The 3-D Owner's Guide provides a pilot's view of the Millennium Falcon, from her armaments and defense to her life support and propulsion.

Each page details the technology of a different system with a meticulously illustrated cutout. When the guide is closed, the cutouts fit together to create a three-dimensional model of the famed YT-1300 light freighter.
